eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Calhoun, AR; at 09:18 AM ON JAN 22, 2026 Effective until 09:18 AM JAN 25, 2026. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Have emergency supplies readily available, including food, water, medications, and essential items
Ensure you have multiple ways to receive weather alerts and emergency notifications
Follow guidance from local officials 
Remain vigilant, stay informed, and check in on family members, neighbors, and friends, especially those who may need additional assistance
